rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with natural stone flooring, aligned according to Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Large living room with eco-friendly flooring and ample natural light from large windows, ensuring positive energy flow.
Open dining area integrated into the living space with a view of the balcony for fresh air.
Fully equipped eco-friendly kitchen designed for optimal energy efficiency and natural ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Guest bedroom with ample space and a private balcony for relaxation, designed to promote positive flow of energy.
Master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony aligned with Vastu principles for wellness and privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned in the north direction to ensure auspicious entry according to Vastu.
East-facing window for morning sunlight and energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Westward door for secondary exit, ensuring balanced airflow and energy distribution.

rooms.description: Second bedroom with a private balcony, designed to ensure comfort and adherence to Vastu for wellness.
Third bedroom featuring eco-friendly features and a spacious balcony to promote natural light and air circulation.
Fourth bedroom with a private balcony, oriented for optimal Vastu flow and privacy.
Dedicated study room featuring natural light and energy-efficient design for focused work and learning.
Spacious common balcony shared across bedrooms, ensuring outdoor relaxation while remaining Vastu-compliant.

openings.description: Staircase positioned in the northwest, ensuring secure access between floors and compliance with Vastu for stability.
East-facing window to provide ample natural light and maintain energy balance on the first floor.

notes: This design emphasizes eco-friendly features such as natural ventilation, sustainable materials, and Vastu-compliant orientations. The villa layout has been designed to maximize natural light and energy flow across all levels while ensuring privacy, comfort, and luxury.
